how to buy $boris
step 1:
have ton in your wallet to switch to$boris. if you don’t have any ton, you can buy ton from an exchange orcross chain swap and send it to your wallet.
step 2:
download tonkeeper or your wallet ofchoice from the app store or google play store for free. dekstop users, downloadthe google chrome extension by going to tonkeeper app.
step 3:
connect to dedust.io in your browser or mobile app.connect your wallet. paste the $boris token address into dedust and confirm the swap. when tonkeeperprompts you for a wallet signature, sign
step 4:
switch TON for $boris - take a shotof vodka and boom you’re a part of our community
